bioconda.name: bioconductor-quasr
bioconda.summary: Quantify and Annotate Short Reads in R

biotools.summary: This package provides a framework for the quantification and analysis of Short Reads. It covers a complete workflow starting from raw sequence reads, over creation of alignments and quality control plots, to the quantification of genomic regions of interest.

bioschemas.name: QuasR
bioschemas.summary: This package provides a framework for the quantification and analysis of Short Reads. It covers a complete workflow starting from raw sequence reads, over creation of alignments and quality control plots, to the quantification of genomic regions of interest.
